channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Shining A Light On Shadow AI
item.description: Shadow AI (like most forms of shadow technology and bring your own device activity) is viewed as a negative, an infringement and a risk.

item.title: In The AI Revolution, Medical Schools Are Falling Behind U.S. Colleges
item.description: A recent study found that only 14% of medical schools have developed a formal GenAI curriculum compared with 60% of undergraduate programs.

item.title: See Venus At Its Best As The ‘Morning Star’ Peaks This Week
item.description: On July 8, Venus shines as the "Morning Star," reaching its peak in the east-northeast sky. Look 30 mins before sunrisefor the best view.

item.title: See A Full ‘Buck Moon’ And Venus Rise As Jupiter Returns: The Night Sky This Week
item.description: Each Monday, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead (which also apply to mid-northern latitudes in the Northern Hemisphere...

item.title: Google Starts Checking If Your PC Can Switch To Windows 11
item.description: All Windows 10 users should now upgrade if they can.

item.title: Not smart vs. stupid
